Class CrudControllerBase<T extends BaseEntity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.huksley.app.system.CrudControllerBase<T>

    @NoRepositoryBean
public abstract class CrudControllerBase<T extends BaseEntity>
extends Object
    Simple CRUD API base for REST API
